attributes.action: No longer confident in Priminster Theresa May. We ask her to RESIGN leadership.
attributes.background: As the current vote of no confidence has gone out against Theresa May from her own party, It is the voice of the public that should be listened to not a singular Governing Party. We the People no longer want this Shameful embarrassment of a Priminister to Lead this country any longer

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister.
